system.levelAdaptation:
After level 5: +5 Health, +D6 damage

After level 10: +5 Health, +D6 damage, +10 Combat Skill

actions.name: Illusory Mirage
actions.description: The Veilshifter creates illusory duplicates of itself and its surroundings. It becomes heavily obscured, and all attacks targeting it have Disadvantage until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Ethereal Distortion (Magical)
actions.description: The Veilshifter distorts reality around it, creating a shifting landscape of illusions, causing all creatures in the area to become Sickened (20) for D4 rounds.

actions.name: Reality Flux (Magical)
actions.description: The Veilshifter manipulates reality, causing a torrent of illusions to clash upon a target, dealing 2D6 Arcane damage.

actions.name: Doppelganger Surge
actions.description: The Veilshifter summons illusory doppelgangers that support it in combat. Two doppelgangers appear near the Veilshifter and use its Illusory Mirage action immediately on themselves. These doppelgangers last until they've been struck once, and only act once per round each. In their turn, a doppelganger makes a Physical attack against a target, dealing 2D4 Psychic damage if landing a strike. Only 4 doppelgangers can be active at a time.

actions.name: Dreamscape Shift (Magical)
actions.description: The Veilshifter warps the battlefield into an illusory dreamscape, altering the terrain. All creatures in the area must succeed on an Athletics check or fall Prone.

actions.name: Mystic Gaze (Magical)
actions.description: The Veilshifter gazes at a target, causing it to perceive illusory but very harmful threats, suffering 4D6 Arcane damage.

system.description: Veilshifter, the Illusory Archon, is a terrifying creature that commands illusions and weaves intricate webs of deceit. Its form is ever-changing, a kaleidoscope of images that confound the senses, and its mastery over illusory arts casts doubt upon the very fabric of truth. Its manipulation of reality can transform the battlefield into a surreal dreamscape, summoning ephemeral doppelgangers that mimic its abilities, creating a challenge for those who face it, as they attempt to decipher the real from the unreal.
